description: Retrieves the details about a specific import task.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the import file task. This ID is returned in the response of  StartImportFileTask.

nested_items.name: completionTime
nested_items.description: The time that the import task completed.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The import file task id returned in the response of  StartImportFileTask.

nested_items.name: importName
nested_items.description: The name of the import task given in  StartImportFileTask.

nested_items.name: inputS3Bucket
nested_items.description: The S3 bucket where import file is located.

nested_items.name: inputS3Key
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 key name of the import file.

nested_items.name: numberOfRecordsFailed
nested_items.description: The number of records that failed to be imported.

nested_items.name: numberOfRecordsSuccess
nested_items.description: The number of records successfully imported.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: Start time of the import task.

nested_items.name: statusReportS3Bucket
nested_items.description: The S3 bucket name for status report of import task.

nested_items.name: statusReportS3Key
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 key name for status report of import task. The report contains details about whether each record imported successfully or why it did not.
